name: Teamfight Tactics
summary: Teamfight Tactics is a standalone auto battler video game developed and published by Riot Games for Android and iOS. It was initially released as a game mode for League of Legends on June 26, 2019 for Microsoft Windows and macOS.
info:
• 中文名: 云顶之弈
  • 开发: Riot Games
  • 发行: Riot Games
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Android
  • 平台: iOS
  • 游戏类型: Auto battler
  • 游玩人数: 多人
  • 发行日期: 2019年6月26日
